name: BrickVenture
description:
BrickVenture is the Official BloxGame Sucesor (AKA: BloxGame 2:The Next Blocks) This Sucesor Includes a New Boss, More Blocks, More Fun and yeah enjoy, BrickVenture Haves a Save System, Unlike BloxGame,  BrickVenture haves More Features than Blox Game

BrickVenture Features that BloxGame didnt had Features BloxGame Had and are Deprecated Save System Interface Bosses Movements Chapters Bubbles Bigger Maintened Server Inactive Server

BrickVenture is more maintaned than BloxGame, BrickVenture's Antecesor was Feature-Less and Very Very Code-Less
